channel.title: Re/Fragmented - James Lucien [Downtempo]
channel.description:
https://soundcloud.com/james-lucien-official/refragmented
[details=Artwork] ![refragmented|499x500](upload://cvYdK6ontqr7ow7Bo8kkmkzGSYM.jpg) [/details]
This will most likely be my last song for a very long time, if not my last song ever aside for the collaborations I still have with other people. To those people I am sincerely sorry that I've been neglectful of our songs together and I will work on them now. This song took a long time, but after 6 long months, I feel I can finally consider this song complete in its fullest potential. Enjoy.

item.title: Re/Fragmented - James Lucien [Downtempo]
item.dc:creator: DHO
item.description:
I had some neat ideas for a remix though not sure when I’d have time since I’m also doing some collabs at the moment. spoiler

Read full topic

item.title: Re/Fragmented - James Lucien [Downtempo]
item.dc:creator: TheRealJFalc
item.description:
I’m not entirely sure, but at this point there’s some personal things involved. I need to stop fixating on myself and start thinking of others. Btw be prepared for collabs to start happening soon xD

Also, if anyone is interested in a remix of this let me know, I’m considering being hip and doing a remix contest honestly.

Read full topic

item.title: Re/Fragmented - James Lucien [Downtempo]
item.dc:creator: DHO
item.description:
Very nice song. But why are you stopping songwriting?

Read full topic

item.title: Re/Fragmented - James Lucien [Downtempo]
item.dc:creator: Coral
item.description:
If you make music every single day I can promise that in a few months you’ll love your music and will never want to quit…

Read full topic
